text: geudeul-i malhani “sillo hananimkkeseoneun uliege myeonghasyeoss-euni, sadoga jemul-eul gajyeowa bul-i geugeos-eul samkyeobeoligi jeonkkajineun geuleul midji malla hasyeossso.” geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘imi na ijeon-e sadodeul-i geudaedeul-ege dolaehayeoss-euni bunmyeonghan jeung-geodeulgwa geudaedeul-i malhadeon geos-eul gajyeowassnola. geuleondedo -geudaedeul-i jinsildoen jalamyeon- wae geudaedeul-eun geudeul-eul salhaehayeossneunga?’
